title: Prime Number Trade Count
mechanism: ABSURD HYPOTHESIS: Markets with a prime number of trades (7, 11, 13, 17, 19, 23, 29, 31...) may indicate markets that 'naturally' stopped at an awkward number - possibly due to information revelation.

proposed_signal.condition: Total trade count is a prime number
proposed_signal.action: Analyze if prime-count markets have different edge patterns
